Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class AudioEmitter

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.AudioEmitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
public class AudioEmitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
Emits a collection of audio clips at a given configuration. Contains both waiting and active audio.

    • apply

      public void apply​(double volume, double balance)
      Updates all currently active and waiting audio with given configuration. Activates all waiting audio.
      Parameters:
      volume - volume to emit audio at; constrained [0.0, 1.0]
      balance - balance (panning) to emit audio at; constrained [-1.0, 1.0]
